title: Meatloaf and Vegetables
directions: 1 Thoroughly mix the beef, 1/2 cup soup, bread crumbs, Worcestershire, black pepper, egg and onion in a large bowl. Shape the beef mixture into an 8 x 4-inch loaf in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Arrange the potatoes and carrots around meatloaf in the baking pan.
2 Bake at 375°F. for 30 minutes. Spoon off any fat.

3 Stir the remaining soup and water in a small bowl. Spoon the soup mixture over the meatloaf and vegetables. Bake for 30 minutes or until the meatloaf is cooked through and the vegetables are fork-tender.
ingredients: 2 cans (10 3/4 ounces each ) Campbell’s® Condensed Tomato Soup
1 3/4 pounds potatoes (about 6 medium potatoes), cut into quarters
6 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces (about 3 cups)
